lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
You and your friend are rough-housing near the stairwell at school. Your friend is much bigger than you are. He holds you up over the stairwell and threatens to drop you down.
You look down at the long drop and close your eyes.
The more you act scared, the more he is going to do this to you, so you try to keep calm.
Your friend's shirt gets caught on the banister on top of the stairwell. As he tries to pull you back up over the railing his grip begins to loosen.
A muscle in his shoulder rips, he lets go and you plunge three floors to the ground. Your leg is broken, and as a result, your Physical sphere declines substantially.
